movementSpeed.title: Ground Movement Speed
movementSpeed.tooltip: This changes how quickly Ernesto traces your path when you are in a gravity field, like on a planet.

spaceSpeed.title: Space Acceleration Speed
spaceSpeed.tooltip: This changes how quickly Ernesto accelerates towards you in space.

spaceAccelerationType.title: Space Acceleration Type
spaceAccelerationType.tooltip: Linear means Ernesto gets closer to you at a constant rate, regardless of how fast you're traveling. Cumulative means Ernesto builds up speed and eventually intercepts you, but it may have unpredictable movement. Timed means Ernesto will reach you after a fixed amount of time.

spaceTimer.title: Interception Time
spaceTimer.tooltip: For use with the Timed acceleration type. This determines how long it will take for Ernesto to catch up to you in space.

brambleSpeedMultiplier.title: Dark Bramble Speed Multiplier
brambleSpeedMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase Ernesto's speed in Dark Bramble seeds.

dreamWorldSpeedMultiplier.title: Dream World Speed Multiplier
dreamWorldSpeedMultiplier.tooltip: Larger numbers increase Ernesto's speed in the dream world.

startDelay.title: Start Delay
startDelay.tooltip: The time in seconds Ernesto waits before chasing you.

enableStealthMode.title: Enable Stealth Mode
enableStealthMode.tooltip: Makes Ernesto silent and turns off his light. You won't know where he is until he's right behind you.

enableQuantumMode.title: Enable Quantum Mode
enableQuantumMode.tooltip: Freezes Ernesto if you can see him, but makes him move at maximum speed when you look away.

customEndScreen.title: Custom Death Screen
customEndScreen.tooltip: Turn this off to reset the loop like normal if Ernesto catches you.
